definition: to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous

sentences.english: The dry river-bed clothes finds no thanks for its past.
sentences.chinese: 枯槁的河床，并不谢谢它的已往。

sentences.english: It is a very different virus that we're dealing with.
sentences.chinese: 它和我们已往所对付的病毒都不大一样。

sentences.english: Next time you're in London, come and visit us.
sentences.chinese: 您下次去伦敦已往探看我们。

sentences.english: One recalls the past semester, we feel an upsurge of agitation.
sentences.chinese: 回忆已往的一学期，咱们心潮荡漾。

sentences.english: He could remember events in the past.
In past centuries, Brahmins have been the primary practitioners of Jyotish.
sentences.chinese: 在已往数世纪，婆罗门是首要的周谛士在业者。

sentences.english: Kogan was and is a less well-known name in the West.
sentences.chinese: 高根已往以及如今全都在西方一些著名度较低的名称。

sentences.english: He used to . would spend every penny he earned on books.
sentences.chinese: 已往他凡是把挣来的钱全花在买书了。

sentences.english: After all, the logic went, they had risen almost every year in the past.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，据已往的逻辑，过去几乎每年房价都是上涨的。

sentences.english: The piece goods are to be wrapped in kraft IT, then packed in wooden cases.
sentences.chinese: 布疋在装进木箱已往要用牛皮纸包好。

sentences.english: The geological prospecting and mining history has been reviewed, in the coal basin of western Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 文章回顾了京西煤田已往地质勘查及开采状况。

sentences.english: EX:That reminded me of the time when I hoffer to lose weight by just eating pears.
sentences.chinese: 那让我想起已往那段只吃青苹果减肥的日子。

sentences.english: Brightness Theory is different from the previous studies of intelligence training.
sentences.chinese: 聪明理论与已往的智力开发研究是不同的。

sentences.english: Forget the past and look to now.
sentences.chinese: 健忘已往，驾驭如今，才无将来。

sentences.english: You thellonk that by saying, "I'm sorry, " all the past can be corrected.
sentences.chinese: 你认为说“我抱愧”，已往的一切就能更正吗？

definition: recently/until now/up to the present/lately/also written 爾來|尔来
to continue the same old routine/to carry on just as before/to procrastinate
that being the case/then/in that case
